reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 493/99: DESIGNATION - H. DODGE HAULAGE LTD. LANDFILL SITE
reg_info.reg_name_text: DESIGNATION — H. DODGE HAULAGE LTD. LANDFILL SITE
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 493/99: DESIGNATION - H. DODGE HAULAGE LTD. LANDFILL SITE
reg_info.act_under: Environmental Assessment Act   Loi sur les évaluations environnementales

content.content: 1. In this Regulation, “H. Dodge Haulage Ltd. Landfill Site” means any landfill site that is located on Lot 11, Concession III, Merritt Township in the Territorial District of Sudbury. O. Reg. 493/99, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. In this Regulation,

“H. Dodge Haulage Ltd. Landfill Site” means any landfill site that is located on Lot 11, Concession III, Merritt Township in the Territorial District of Sudbury. O. Reg. 493/99, s. 1.

content.content: 2. Any enterprise or activity of increasing the area on which waste may be deposited at the H. Dodge Haulage Ltd. Landfill Site or expanding the volume of waste that may be deposited at the H. Dodge Haulage Ltd. Landfill Site beyond 1,190,000 cubic metres is defined as a major commercial or business enterprise or activity and is designated as an undertaking to which this Act applies. O. Reg. 493/99, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. Any enterprise or activity of increasing the area on which waste may be deposited at the H. Dodge Haulage Ltd. Landfill Site or expanding the volume of waste that may be deposited at the H. Dodge Haulage Ltd. Landfill Site beyond 1,190,000 cubic metres is defined as a major commercial or business enterprise or activity and is designated as an undertaking to which this Act applies. O. Reg. 493/99, s. 2.
